content.content: Greetings from the Content Production Core Unit!  Administrative Updates  Procured business insurance   Content Production Video  Published  [Maker Relay] Votes & Polls (8/31 - 9/07) & (9/07 - 9/13) [Maker Relay] The State of Dai (8/31-9/07) & (9/07-9/13)   Finalizing draft of explainer video: How to Vote in Governance Collaborating with GovAlpha on scripts for further explainer videos  Writing   https://forum.makerdao.com/  Maker Relay Ep 63 and Ep 64 in collaboration with GovComms.    https://makerdaoupdates.substack.com/  Maker Relay #63 Maker Relay #64 The State of Dai #06 The State of Dai #07    Other  Represented MakerDAO at Mainnet  Continued conducting Brand Research interviews Launching the Dai Curious Dashboard  Organized the Delegate Compensation discussion in collaboration with GovComms Performed content audits of makerdao.com and the Community Portal Rebuilding the Community Portal CMS in Webflow   Looking Ahead In the coming weeks, we’ll be:  Hosting an AMA with Pairwyse  Moving our budget to Formal Submission Distributing an NFT to Rocket.chat users - Please see @davidutro’s post to sign up!   As always, check out our Transparency Dashboard to see what we’re working on and please join us for our weekly Office Hours on Tuesdays at 14:30 UTC.
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
